title: Does anyone else freeze after someone dodges in new client?

replies.body:
Is this only happening in the Beta Client? Does this also happen if you collapse your friends list groups prior to queueing up for a match?

https://imgur.com/a/GJulP

Try queueing up for a custom match and let me know if you noticed any difference.
It just freezes on match found after someone dodges, to the point where I have to wait until it says I declined the afk check to try and q again

Is this still happening? We deployed a hotfix for a similar issue that may have also resolved the issue you're experiencing. If you're still seeing this, try collapsing your friends list groups, as I originally suggested so we can see if that helps.

what just happened to me after someone dodged is that my client connected but my screen turned black and i could not pick. i heard the timer and it dodged me.
in the bugs forum i read that it happened to someone else as well
after it dodged me all the info reappeared, the client was visible again.

So regarding this issue also, It's happening to me too I figure I'd just try to explain my side in more depth. ( have not attempted the custom match part yet tho ). When ever I queue up and someone fails to choose a champion or dodge, the client i guess "half freezes" theres still an animation but you cant do anything or click anything and it isnt unresponsive. The little hash marks that usually go around a champion someones picking where it displays the splash art turns to almost a cats eye pupil shape and theres a 0 at the top. other than that the rest of the client is blue. You cant click anywhere and you can minimize it and bring it back up but changes nothing. After a good 30 seconds to maybe 2 minutes if a queue pop comes up you see it with the accept button and decline button but no animations, you can try to click it but nothing really happens. One time i did try clicking accept and it worked but was still frozen and i was "in" the champ select part. After a little while half way through the banning phase it unfroze and i was the third one banning and had seconds left, luckily got my ban in and it unfroze the rest of the time. It's very weird why this is happening. It might be something to do with not being in low spec mode, even tho I have a CPU and RAM monitor showing 100% of the time and it wasnt capped it was around 60% CPU usage and 40% ram usage. Not sure if any of this helps but :D
